fig.label: Figure

caption.p:
Countries at risk for Zika virus infection. A, The world map shows locations with known Zika virus presence in dark green (current as of March 2018). Data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
16 B, Countries suitable for Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus.

fig.attrib:
Data from Int J Infect Dis.
17 Created with https://mapchart.net
